actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations

official_title: To amend the Dale Long Public Safety Officers' Benefits Improvements Act of 2012 to change the retroactive application of the Act to cover injuries sustained by rescue squad or ambulance crew members on or after December 1, 2007, rather than June 1, 2009.
short_title: Kline DeWire Public Safety Officers' Retroactive Benefits Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Kline DeWire Public Safety Officers' Retroactive Benefits Act

 This bill amends the Dale Long Public Safety Officers' Benefits Improvements Act of 2012 to provide that such Act shall apply to injuries sustained by rescue squad or ambulance crew members on or after December 1, 2007 (currently, June 1, 2009).

titles.title: Kline DeWire Public Safety Officers' Retroactive Benefits Act

To amend the Dale Long Public Safety Officers' Benefits Improvements Act of 2012 to change the retroactive application of the Act to cover injuries sustained by rescue squad or ambulance crew members on or after December 1, 2007, rather than June 1, 2009.
